input.sentences: a man controls the music at the bike race .
the bikes are lining up for the race .
they race on the road in a line .
one of the bikers is very tired and takes a break .
he bikers pose for a photo .
output.sentences: Right on time, the deejay played music to signify the start of the bike race.
The cyclists began to take their places.
Before long, the race was underway.
It was an exhausting event for all.
At race's end, the course leaders were memorialized in a photgraph.
